title: UFYB 244: Three Money Mindset Lessons from the Feminist Business Mastermind
itunes:title: Three Money Mindset Lessons from the Feminist Business Mastermind
description:
The mindset women have around money has been affected in no small part by how we have been socialized. At my Feminist Business Mastermind a few weeks ago, I shared three main money mindset lessons that all women - whether you own a business or not - should hear.

 

Listen to this week’s podcast episode to learn why understanding the nuanced difference between asking and offering is so important, why women have been socialized to believe they’re bad with money, and the importance of making sure you’ve carefully chosen your thoughts before you make an offer.

 

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/244
